name: Chaos Dungeon (CRA Games)
description:
Harness the power of unstable magic and use it to clear the Dungeon of Chaos!

You get 4 randomized  abilities that will re-randomizes after some time (so unstable), but all your enemies are also made from the same magic. So they two randomizes with you.

Defeat the 3 bosses of Unstable bloc-kines and master the power of UNSTABLE MAGIC.

LD49:  ldj.am/$259999
